Name: assign_user_story_to_sprint
Description: 1 if a user story is assigned to the current sprint

Name: select_feature_for_release
Description: 1 if a feature is included in a given release plan

Name: activate_sprint_goal
Description: 1 if a sprint goal is selected for the sprint

Name: allocate_capacity_to_team
Description: Proportion of capacity allocated to a team

Name: assign_task_to_worker
Description: 1 if a task is assigned to a specific worker

Name: escalate_blocker
Description: 1 if a blocker is escalated for immediate resolution

Name: prioritize_feature
Description: Priority rank (lower is higher priority) for a feature

Name: select_epic_for_planning
Description: 1 if an epic is selected into near-term planning

Name: allocate_budget_to_project
Description: Normalized budget allocation share for a project

Name: choose_scrum_master_for_team
Description: 1 if a scrum master is assigned to a team

Name: include_task_in_board
Description: 1 if a task is visible on the scrum board

Name: set_story_point_commitment
Description: Committed story points for a user story
